acts.title: Act 1 — First Date
steps: You decide to meet someone new for coffee.
Your child is staying with your ex.
Do you tell your ex about this date or keep it private?

acts.title: Act 2 — Introducing the Idea
steps: Weeks later, your child overhears a phone chat.
Choices: honest but gentle; change the subject; dismiss quickly.

acts.title: Act 3 — First Reactions
steps: Your ex finds out you’ve started dating; reaction varies.
Options: reassure child‑first approach; argue; refuse to discuss.

acts.title: Act 4 — Resolution
steps: Negative: conflict worsens; child feels caught.
